items.name: Bodhi Tree's Jungle Oasis Pool
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in serenity at this stunning infinity pool, seamlessly blending with the surrounding jungle canopy and offering breathtaking views.
items.location_hint: Bodhi Tree Yoga Resort, Playa Guiones

items.name: Harmonía's Sunset Infinity Edge
items.short_description: Witness spectacular sunsets from this elevated infinity pool, offering panoramic ocean vistas and a peaceful atmosphere.
items.location_hint: Harmonía de Nosara, Near Playa Pelada

items.name: Gilded Iguana's Tropical Dip
items.short_description: Relax by this inviting infinity pool, a refreshing escape amidst the vibrant energy of Playa Guiones, perfect after a surf session.
items.location_hint: The Gilded Iguana Surf Hotel, Playa Guiones

items.name: Olas Verdes' Eco-Luxury Pool
items.short_description: Discover an infinity pool designed with sustainability in mind, offering a tranquil retreat surrounded by native flora and fauna.
items.location_hint: Olas Verdes Hotel, Playa Guiones

items.name: The Original Nosara 'Pulpería'
items.short_description: Step back in time at this charming, well-preserved wooden 'pulpería' (general store), a nostalgic glimpse into Nosara's past.
items.location_hint: Nosara Town Center (near the main intersection)

items.name: Nosara's Serene Village Church
items.short_description: Discover the simple beauty of Nosara's local church, a modest yet historically significant landmark reflecting the community's heart.
items.location_hint: Nosara Town Center

items.name: Hacienda Dora's Rustic Elegance
items.short_description: Admire the authentic charm of this traditional Costa Rican hacienda-style home, featuring classic wooden architecture and a rich local history.
items.location_hint: Outskirts of Nosara, towards Santa Marta

items.name: The Legendary Surf Shack
items.short_description: Capture a piece of Nosara's surf legacy at this iconic, weathered wooden shack, a testament to the town's humble beginnings as a surf paradise.
items.location_hint: Near Playa Guiones North Entrance

items.name: Nosara's Vibrant Feria
items.short_description: Experience the lively colors and aromas of Nosara's weekly farmers' market, brimming with local produce, artisanal crafts, and fresh delights.
items.location_hint: Near Super Nosara, Playa Guiones

items.name: Guiones Artisan Showcase
items.short_description: Browse unique handcrafted jewelry, textiles, and art at this charming artisanal market, perfect for finding a special souvenir.
items.location_hint: Playa Guiones, near Bodhi Tree

items.name: Nosara Sunset Bazaar
items.short_description: Experience the magic of a Nosara evening at this seasonal night market, offering delicious street food, live music, and local crafts under the stars.
items.location_hint: Various locations, check local listings

items.name: Surf & Style Boutique
items.short_description: Discover a curated selection of local surf art, apparel, and unique beach-inspired gifts at this charming boutique, embodying Nosara's laid-back vibe.
items.location_hint: Playa Guiones, Main Road

items.name: Harmony Haven Botanical Gardens
items.short_description: Wander through lush, vibrant gardens showcasing exotic tropical flora, a serene escape designed for meditation and tranquility.
items.location_hint: Various Yoga Retreats (e.g., The Sanctuary)

items.name: Villa Las Flores Secret Garden
items.short_description: Discover a hidden gem of flowering plants and native species within the enchanting private gardens of a beautiful Nosara villa.
items.location_hint: Specific villas near Playa Pelada (check local tours)

items.name: Finca Victoria Edible Landscape
items.short_description: Explore the vibrant permaculture gardens of Finca Victoria, a functional and beautiful space where edible plants and flowers thrive in harmony.
items.location_hint: Finca Victoria, Ostional Road

items.name: Nosara's Butterfly Sanctuary
items.short_description: Step into a magical world of fluttering wings and vibrant blooms at this dedicated butterfly garden, home to numerous native species.
items.location_hint: Near Nosara Biological Reserve

items.name: The Secluded Cove Pathway
items.short_description: Embark on an adventurous jungle pathway leading to a pristine, secluded beach, offering breathtaking views and a sense of discovery.
items.location_hint: North of Playa Pelada, ask locals for directions

items.name: Bodhi Tree's Canopy Walk
items.short_description: Stroll along the elevated wooden walkways connecting the various sections of Bodhi Tree, offering unique perspectives of the resort's lush grounds.
items.location_hint: Bodhi Tree Yoga Resort, Playa Guiones

items.name: Nosara River Mouth Trail
items.short_description: Follow the winding path along the Nosara River to its picturesque mouth, where it meets the Pacific Ocean – a haven for birdwatching and scenic views.
items.location_hint: Nosara River, between Nosara Town and Playa Nosara

items.name: La Luna's Cliffside Ascent
items.short_description: Ascend the charming stone steps leading to La Luna Restaurant, an iconic pathway to one of Nosara's most beloved sunset dining spots.
items.location_hint: Playa Pelada, leading to La Luna Restaurant

items.name: Gilded Iguana's Contemporary Edge
items.short_description: Admire the sleek lines and innovative design of The Gilded Iguana, a perfect blend of modern luxury and tropical elegance, optimized for surf culture.
items.location_hint: The Gilded Iguana Surf Hotel, Playa Guiones

items.name: The Nomadic Hotel's Minimalist Charm
items.short_description: Experience understated luxury and clean, modern aesthetics at The Nomadic Hotel, where design harmonizes with the surrounding natural beauty.
items.location_hint: The Nomadic Hotel, Playa Guiones

items.name: Casa Akana's Tropical Modernism
items.short_description: Marvel at this stunning private villa, showcasing open-concept living, sustainable materials, and breathtaking views, a true masterpiece of tropical modernism.
items.location_hint: Highlands of Guiones

items.name: Zen Sanctuary Shala
items.short_description: Find peace within the elegant, open-air design of a newly built yoga shala, featuring natural wood and high ceilings that invite the jungle in.
items.location_hint: Various yoga centers (e.g., Playa Guiones)

items.name: Pura Vida Vibes Mural
items.short_description: Capture the essence of Costa Rica with this vibrant 'Pura Vida' mural, a colorful and uplifting expression of Nosara's laid-back lifestyle.
items.location_hint: Main road, Playa Guiones near local businesses

items.name: The Wave Rider's Dream
items.short_description: An impressive mural celebrating Nosara's surf culture, featuring dynamic waves and silhouettes of surfers, perfect for a photo op.
items.location_hint: Near surf shops on Playa Guiones main street

items.name: Jungle Friends Graffiti
items.short_description: Discover a heartwarming mural showcasing Costa Rica's iconic wildlife, from playful monkeys to colorful toucans, bringing the jungle to the streets.
items.location_hint: Walls along Nosara Road

items.name: Protect Our Oceans Mural
items.short_description: An impactful mural conveying a powerful message of ocean conservation and environmental stewardship, reflecting Nosara's commitment to sustainability.
items.location_hint: Near Nosara Refuge for Wildlife or local eco-shops

items.name: Ostional's Sweeping Sandy Expanse
items.short_description: Discover the vast, raw beauty of Playa Ostional's wide sandy shores, where the ocean meets an almost desert-like expanse of sand, especially at low tide.
items.location_hint: Playa Ostional (north of Nosara)

items.name: Guiones Low Tide Sands
items.short_description: At low tide, Playa Guiones reveals expansive, flat sandy areas stretching towards the horizon, creating a unique, vast landscape perfect for long walks.
items.location_hint: Playa Guiones (near the main surf break)

items.name: Nosara River Mouth Sand Bar
items.short_description: Explore the dynamic sand formations at the Nosara River mouth, where shifting sandbars create intriguing patterns and small, soft 'dunes' along the shoreline.
items.location_hint: Nosara River Mouth, where it meets Playa Nosara

items.name: Garza's Untamed Dunes
items.short_description: Venture to Playa Garza's wilder stretches, where natural coastal dunes and undisturbed sandy shores offer a feeling of vastness and isolation.
items.location_hint: Playa Garza (south of Nosara)

items.name: The Secret Garden Courtyard
items.short_description: Escape the dusty roads into this serene, lush courtyard, a hidden oasis brimming with tropical plants and a calming atmosphere.
items.location_hint: Behind a cafe on the main road, Playa Guiones

items.name: Bodhi Tree's Zen Alley
items.short_description: Discover a peaceful, secluded alleyway within the Bodhi Tree Resort, designed for quiet contemplation amidst tropical foliage and subtle decor.
items.location_hint: Bodhi Tree Yoga Resort, Playa Guiones

items.name: La Bodega's Rustic Patio
items.short_description: Enjoy your morning coffee in this charming, rustic outdoor patio, a local favorite for its cozy atmosphere and shaded comfort away from the main road.
items.location_hint: La Bodega Cafe, Playa Guiones

items.name: L'acqua Viva's Inner Sanctuary
items.short_description: Find tranquility within the beautifully landscaped central courtyard of Hotel L'acqua Viva, a peaceful space for relaxation and reflection.
items.location_hint: Hotel L'acqua Viva, Playa Guiones

items.name: Pacifico Azul Sunset Deck
items.short_description: Savor delicious cuisine with unparalleled panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean and Nosara's lush coastline from this stunning rooftop dining spot.
items.location_hint: Pacifico Azul Restaurant, Playa Pelada

items.name: Bodhi Tree's Sunrise Shala View
items.short_description: Greet the day with an invigorating yoga session or simply enjoy the expansive jungle views from Bodhi Tree's elevated, open-air shala.
items.location_hint: Bodhi Tree Yoga Resort, Playa Guiones

items.name: Iguana's Elevated Social Spot
items.short_description: Unwind with cocktails and good company at The Gilded Iguana's stylish rooftop lounge, offering a lively atmosphere and views of the town and lush surroundings.
items.location_hint: The Gilded Iguana Surf Hotel, Playa Guiones

items.name: Nosara Mirador Sunset Point
items.short_description: Ascend to this local lookout point, offering expansive, unobstructed views of Nosara's coastline, perfect for capturing a panoramic sunset photo.
items.location_hint: Hills overlooking Playa Guiones/Playa Pelada
